mapper.select: select * from t_user Order by uId DESC
mapper.insert: insert into t_user (uAccNum, uPwd, uNickName, uSex, uBirthday, uEmail, uTel, uAdress,uPic) values (#{uAccNum},#{uPwd},#{uNickName},#{uSex},#{uBirthday},#{uEmail},#{uTel},#{uAdress},#{uPic})
mapper.update: update t_user set uAccNum = #{uAccNum}, uPwd = #{uPwd}, uNickName = #{uNickName}, uSex = #{uSex}, uBirthday=#{uBirthday}, uEmail = #{uEmail}, uTel=#{uTel}, uAdress = #{uAdress} where uId = #{uId}
mapper.select:
select distinct * from t_user
uAccNum like '%${key}%' or uNickName like '%${key}%' or uEmail like '%${key}%' or uTel like '%${key}%'
AND exists( select * from t_user limit #{startIndex},#{endIndex} )
